artifacts.title: This Sensor can detect the strength of a magnetic field on x-, y-, and z-axes. It can measure three-dimensional, linear, angular, and rotational movements and transmit the data.
artifacts.description:
This Sensor can detect the strength of a magnetic field on x-, y-, and z-axes. It can measure three-dimensional, linear, angular, and rotational movements and transmit the data.

The Sensor will be usable to enable e.g, the Feature of User Force Control (UFC). For more Details please make use of the Implementation Guide 3D Magnetic Sensor with ECtr. #00000

artifacts.title: Example in ODA SIF:
artifacts.description:
Example in ODA SIF:



<Subdevices>



<Subdevice Name="VC 5-22 02" FFE="2282615"/>



<Subdevice Name="VC 5-22 02" FFE="2283286"/>



<Subdevice Name="VC 5-22 02" FFE="2283287"/>



<Subdevice Name="VC 5-22 02" FFE="2283289"/>



<Subdevice Name="VC 75-1-22 02" FFE="2283288"/>



</Subdevices>







If present and if FFE is matched with data read from a tool, then Subdevice name will be visible in ODA and in the folder name for collecting ODA capture files of a tool and also as a part of tool's ODA capture file name.
